venue.name: Microsoft New England Research and Development Center

item.description:
Event Hashtag: #bwpm710

Dev/Design: This month's Dev/Design session will feature "WP Workflow", a meetup idea suggested by annie and currently the most requested topic. Her suggestion can be seen here: http://meetup.bostonw...

We plan to cover the following topics:
1.) Setup of WordPress development & production environments
2.) Source code management
3.) Packaging and deploying a release (code)
4.) Data synchronization & updates (content)
5.) Testing
6.) Backup and rollback strategies

This session will be co-presented by Marissa Martinez from GreenFerret, LLC and James Coletti. Marissa has deep background in product development, testing, release management, and project management. Learn more about Marissa and GreenFerret at http://www.greenferre....

ToolBox: Toolbox session will be open office hours. For those who do not want to listen in on WP Workflow (which I would highly encourage despite code), I will be available for any questions you may have on any WordPress issues.

We would also encourage WordPress 3.0 discussions during the networking/pizza session. Feel free to ask one of us or many others about new features.

Agenda:
7-7:30pm - Networking, Pizza, WordPress 3.0 free-for-all
7:30-7:45pm - Opening remarks, updates, any other business
7:50-8:50pm - Sessions (rooms TBD)
8:50-9pm - Wrap-up
item.name: BWPM July 2010: WP Workflow (Dev/Design) & Office Hours (Toolbox)
